episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_10:
I dunno if I’ve ever told you this before, but
Pokémon battling with you is so much fun,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You make battling so exciting! I felt so giddy
after that last one—

Wait! Uh-oh... I’m the one who’s supposed
to be showing YOU hospitality, not the other
way around!
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_04:
OK... As long as it’s not just me soaking up
all the fun!
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_03: Do you want to battle again?
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_04:
Oh, I think I’ve had my fair share of battles for
the day! Thanks, though!
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_10:
It seems like everyone had a really great time
at the party in the end, too! I’m so glad I decided
to host it!

I hope we can do all of this again sometime,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
